panels.description: Requests that failed due to no supply being available
panels.title: Missing supply

panels.description:
What was charged for the average job:
- upscale: from 512x512 to 1024x1024
- txt2img: per 1024x1024 frame
- img2img: per 1024x1024 frame
- txt2vid: per 25 frames of 1024x1024 
- img2vid: per 25 frames of 1024x1024
- audio2txt: per minute of audio
panels.title: Average price

panels.description: Where did the error which caused the job to fail occur? (excluding "no orchestrators available")

targets.expr: sum by (orchestrator_address) (increase(livepeer_ai_request_errors{job=~"^.*$job_livepeer.*$", error_code!~"no orchestrators available.*", pipeline=~"${pipeline:pipe}", model_name=~"${model:pipe}"}[$__range]))

panels.title: Error origin

panels.description:
What was charged for the average job:
- upscale: from 512x512 to 1024x1024
- txt2img: per 1024x1024 frame
- img2img: per 1024x1024 frame
- txt2vid: per 25 frames of 1024x1024 
- img2vid: per 25 frames of 1024x1024
- audio2txt: per minute of audio
panels.title: Average cost

panels.description:
Processing times, the lower the better:
- upscale: time to upscale from 512x512 to 1024x1024
- txt2img: time to generate a 1024x1024 frame
- img2img: time to generate a 1024x1024 frame
- txt2vid: time to generate a 1024x1024 frame
- img2vid: time to generate a 1024x1024 frame
- audio2txt: time to process a second of audio
panels.title: Latency score

panels.description: What's the error message? (excluding "no orchestrators available")

targets.expr: sum by (error_code) (increase(livepeer_ai_request_errors{job=~"^.*$job_livepeer.*$", error_code!~"no orchestrators available.*", pipeline=~"${pipeline:pipe}", model_name=~"${model:pipe}"}[$__range]))

panels.title: Error code

targets.expr: sum by (orchestrator_address, error_code) (increase(livepeer_ai_request_errors{job=~"^.*$job_livepeer.*$", error_code!~"no orchestrators available.*", pipeline=~"${pipeline:pipe}", model_name=~"${model:pipe}"}[$__range]))

panels.description:
Processing times, the lower the better:
- upscale: time to upscale from 512x512 to 1024x1024
- txt2img: time to generate a 1024x1024 frame
- img2img: time to generate a 1024x1024 frame
- txt2vid: time to generate a 1024x1024 frame
- img2vid: time to generate a 1024x1024 frame
- audio2txt: time to process 1 second of audio
panels.title: Latency score
